name: Sex Play - Tropical Vacation
description:
A quick and dirty game made for your pleasure. Contains visual novel elements and a sex simulation part. Take your girlfriend on a tropical vacation and enjoy complete privacy.

GAME DESCRIPTION

The Sex Play series will definitely arouse your senses!

Pack your bags and surprise your girlfriend with an exotic vacation!
Once you land on the island, let the tropical landscapes and the clear blue water take your breath away.
Enjoy your own private beach and get naughty with Rikki in complete privacy.

FEATURES

- HD renders
- HD animations
